title: Topic 004 Question 022
body: You have the following data sources:
•	Finance: On-premises Microsoft SQL Server database
•	Sales: Azure Cosmos DB using the Core (SQL) API
You need to ensure that you can search all the data by using the Azure AI Search REST API.
options: Migrate the data in HR to Azure Blob storage.
Migrate the data in HR to the on-premises SQL server.
Export the data in Finance to Azure Data Lake Storage.
Migrate the data in Sales to the MongoDB API.
